title: Pentagon IG Finds Hegseth ‘Signalgate’ Messages Violated DOD Policy
description: The Department of Defense Inspector General (DoDIG) concluded in a new report released Thursday that Hegseth did not comply with department regulations in disclosing operational details regarding strikes on Houthi targets in March.
content: War Secretary Pete Hegseth did not comply with Pentagon regulations in disclosing operational details on strikes against Houthi targets in March via the Signal app on his personal phone, the Departme… [+3819 chars]
